item.title: Rusty Trader App
item.author: Author
item.description: Introduction Rust Console Edition Rusty Trader is a web app that allows players of Rust: Console Edition to browse and create trades for in-game items. Like many of my projects, Rusty Trader was created from a specific problem I had experienced. Trade is an important aspect of the game and the lack of a built-in text chat makes it difficult. This will be less of an issue once the community is allowed to rent and run game servers.
